name: Admin Console Release 25.10.2
description: This release of the Admin Console brings you some improvements. See below for details on some of the more notable changes applied to the Admin Console.

IMPROVED.text: In the Js widgets section of the Admin Console, we have Removed v2 Recaptcha, and now we allow only the invisible captcha.
Updated the Reset Password error message in Customer Management section under the Admin Console.
You can now delete the unverified emails from the customer's profile using delete button in the Admin Console.
